Chordate/Caitiff:


Caitiff ran out into the battle, swallowing his cowardnice.  Of course, his 
courage could go at the first sign of major trouble.  He brought out a laser 
pistol from subspace into one hand, a photon pistol in the other. 

He fired off three blasts from his laser pistol at Jestorm, and three photon 
blasts from his pistol at Sharpedge.

-----

Chordate quickly activated the shields, and activated the defense systems.  
Over twenty autoguns opened fire on the current attacking Alliance members.
Three EMP cannons opened fire with balls of EMP energy at Sharpedge, 
Jetstorm, and Hell Bat.
